issue.title: [build cop] Homebrew install job fails to find <QtCore/QtCore>

content.raw:
I believe this is from the ExamplesBuild test failures:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopTests/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/201/testReport/(root)/Plugins_ExamplesBuild_Plugins/Plugins_3/

On OS X with homebrew, qt5 is installed `keg_only`, which means you have to add `/usr/local/opt/qt5` to the cmake prefix path. It actually should have failed in cmake instead of just giving a warning. I've modified the example CMakeLists.txt files in 9d0ac3f59c16 (branch issue_2177).
